note:
Basically biohacking with an evolutionary view:
If you go to your local zoo, the animals there are living in a better environment made for their natural needs than you are as a human in our environment. As a consequence we modern humans get sick, we get depressed and we don't live up to our full potential.

I'm gathering information on what it means to be human and how I can improve my surroundings, my habits, my food and my movement so that they fit better to what I as a human evolved to be.
